channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: A Long Bet Pays Off. https://t.co/MMMUelyc1x
This week's Radio Open Source podcast is about the Ukraine invasion and is a must-listen. https://t.co/nzQ1NJhWad
@CindySchauf @LOLGOP @RottenInDenmark Right, I know what you're saying, but imho all children are innocent. Also -- https://t.co/yr9ERwM87t

I think there's some Streisand Effect to what Putin did.
Did he really think anyone would care about Putin's pain when they see what he's willing to do. The Ukraines have what we want said the typical Russian.
When junior comes home from the war (if he does) he'll tell about the grandma he was supposed to kill who reminds him of his bubbe.

Putin’s Aggression Leaves His Right-Wing Fan Club Squirming. https://t.co/LEkkjcmubb
But the same people forgave Trump for Jan 6, so how long will their pain last?
@LOLGOP @RottenInDenmark I think it's pretty obvious, if not, let's let it drop. I'm not really angry, maybe I was for a micro-second. Just kind of depressed that there's no way to win. Take care.
The Man Behind Putin’s Military. https://t.co/iyKwuGEelG
We're getting a clear look at actual tyranny. Invading a country and killing grandmothers because your ego hurts -- that's a good example of tyranny.

@TheRickWilson In a cell.
@TheRickWilson our president, by sanctioning putin himself said we're interested in dealing with this guy anymore, time for regime change.

If a conservative agrees with you and you're a liberal instead of poking them in the eye, just say "I agree." If not what the fuck are you about? Geez louise is it so hard to understand. What will you do when you don't have someone to hate?
If you still don't get it, put down the keyboard and listen to this song.
https://t.co/BqC0DdW79x

@LOLGOP @RottenInDenmark We care about all our children.
@LOLGOP @RottenInDenmark Hope that helps, though it isn't very complicated.
Ukraine soldiers told Russian officer ‘go fuck yourself’ before they died on island. https://t.co/OYCFb5Cigq
Putin’s miscalculation. https://t.co/Be8y9sOswu
Putin is unifying the world, something just a few days ago seemed impossible, and the message is simple, we gave you a chance Putin, now go fuck yourself.
Thousands of Russians Protest President Putin’s Assault on Ukraine. https://t.co/BSTKsyn02r
@asemota Russia was part of the deal to guarantee Ukrainian security in exchange for their giving up their nukes.
Fox News reporter Jennifer Griffin keeps fact-checking her colleagues on Ukraine. https://t.co/LG41dTwRLx
Maybe it’s time to cut off diplomatic relations with Russia as long as Putin and Lavrov are in charge there.
What are the options for Ukraine? https://t.co/AQnJVhWtn1
Twitter is pausing ads and recommendations in Ukraine and Russia. https://t.co/kZa7DvghUq
Russian tennis player signs camera 'No war please' after victory in Dubai. https://t.co/fCrRCi2OZl
The Ukrainians are fighting for us.

1/5 I tuned into a #toolsforthought twitter space today. It's always interesting to hear how users think about your products.
2/5 One of the last people to speak was a ThinkTank user for 35 years, talking about his archive of ideas going back that far and what a resource it is to him. This is something I want to hear about more.
3/5 How can we set these tools up so that 35 years from now you have a resource that you feel is as useful as this person's.
4/5 Last year I indexed a decade of my blog, all in outline form, and it's proven to be an incredible resource for my writing. I still have more I want to index. And the same service is hooked up to Drummer so every user has the same thing, except their archive only go back a few
5/5 months at best.
Finland or Sweden joining Nato would spark Russian response - Moscow warns. https://t.co/t0pDqdbyPF
